channel.title: Cannot connect to server on localhost?
channel.description:
Well i am a bit new to the coding process, but i am trying to code up and view what different codes do, i compile my server to go into the game and see what i have added with the codes, and tweak it, after compiling bother server and client i will run server wait about 1 minute and run the client, now it is a 659 client created by austin, ALL CREDITS TO AUSTIN for project dungeonfest! and the ip and port in Clientsettings.java are set as follows.
public static final String ip = "127.0.0.1"; public static final int port = 43594
and even on local host i cannot connect to the server, the client's CMD is stating: Error.j5gaming.connect or somthing, i do not have portforwarded yet, someone please help me!
Thanks Best regards, Justin

i might be abel to help on team viewer give me ur details for tv in private message and ill help, be quick if u want my help i dont have long

item.title: Cannot connect to server on localhost?

item.description:
@XxXRedemptionXxX wrote:

yes as i posted in the middle of my post the client ip and port are set to 127.0.0.1 and 43594 and i have saved and compiled and it still gives me connecting to update server steadily and will not move, my friend has the same source working but i cannot get it working?? help?
